originalText.text: Dr. Dayan is one of the best retina specialists practicing in NY.  He restored my vision twice (once in each eye - 1 year apart) with precise and skilled retinal surgery procedures. I am so grateful to this doctor and highly recommend his services if you are in need of a top retina specialist.

text.text: Dr. Dayan is one of the best retina specialists practicing in NY.  He restored my vision twice (once in each eye - 1 year apart) with precise and skilled retinal surgery procedures. I am so grateful to this doctor and highly recommend his services if you are in need of a top retina specialist.

originalText.text: He is located at the former eye and ear hospital not the most pleasant it always smells dusty with shabby furniture the equipment appears never to have been sanitized He once performed a manual Pucker surgery which was thankfully successful however he has never provided me with additional information regarding the reemergence of symptoms! Dr Dayan has no facial expression avoids eye contact ! His treatment plan for me was more like a school assignment I am to buy notebook and record daily for a period of three months all the symptoms I’ve experienced! Only then am I to schedule another appointment with him! I hope to see another retina specialist to obtain some clarity on the validity of his assignment! I left as quickly as possible crying all the way home! Dr Dayan seems to forgotten his role as physician! No testing was conducted despite my request to have some concrete testing! Absent any evidence of expression all that remains is. for me complete the assignment of daily manual documentation for next 3 months! I cannot recommend Dr Dayans services however you are free to select the best retinal specialist try to choose wisely.,

originalText.text:
Dr Dyan restored my eyesight in my left eye and saved  the sight in my right eye.
He is a remarkable surgeon and a very compassionate person.

originalText.text: I had an emergency retinal detachment surgery. Dr. Dayan is respectful and soft spoken. A real pleasure to be to taken care of by him. He made a scary situation manageable. He was very thorough and clearly has a lot of experience. Thank you Dr. Dayan. I highly recommend him for all of your retina needs!

He was very thorough and clearly has a lot of experience. Thank you Dr. Dayan. I highly recommend him for all of your retina needs!

originalText.text: Dr Dayan is a caring and skilled Dr and Surgeon. His staff at his office and the Eye and Ear Hospital are amazing. I can see!
